title: Krishna will run your day if you do this! | @madhupanditdasaofficial
speaker: HG Madhu Pandit Dasa

segments.text: Hare Krishna Prabhu, when should one chant Hare Krishna Maha Mantra?
The best time to chant Hare Krishna Maha Mantra is after a long sleep you wake up.
Because your mind is fresh.
Reason being, fresh mind is required. What does fresh mind mean?

Once you start your day, so many thoughts and this and that, it keeps like a guna kala karma will be churning inside you and something and all will be coming in your mind in the midst of that Hare Krishna, Hare Krishna, Krishna Krishna, Hare Hare.
So one side you are mechanically chanting, other side all this thinking is going on.
So that is not a quality chanting, you are not touching unless the shabda that you chant goes inside through your ears into the heart.
Effectiveness is very less.
As I said, it is a science.
If you take a piece of iron and keep it near the fire, you will get a little heat.
Put inside the fire, red hot, little far away, little heat.
So you want a little heat from Hare Krishna or you want a full fire?
Full fire means attentively, early morning, before your day's prarada karma starts, finish your association.
Finish your association with Krishna.
Krishna will run your day.
Your life will become smooth.
He will run your day.
Externally there may be so many difficulties.
External difficulty is not the measure of difficulty.
What you are feeling about that difficulty is difficulty.
